 Ã‚Â³  My name is Simon and I am the director/producer of the film TPB AFK:      Ã‚Â³
 Ã‚Â³  The Pirate Bay Away From Keyboard. After 5 years of hard work, it's a     Ã‚Â³
 Ã‚Â³  great pleasure to finally upload a torrent about this great website       Ã‚Â³
 Ã‚Â³  onto the site itself. In a way, I guess TPB AFK has finally come home.    Ã‚Â³
 Ã‚Â³  This is not just a film about the founders of TPB, but also a film        Ã‚Â³
 Ã‚Â³  about all of you who use the site. Please convert this film into all      Ã‚Â³
